message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. We can discuss further if you want to accept or reject.
You're right, let's start with a fair split. I'll meet you halfway, but I'm hoping to negotiate for more in future rounds!
I'm willing to give you a smaller share this round, but I'm hoping to make up for it in future rounds. Let's see if you'll accept.
You're being generous with the amount, but I'm hoping for a bit more. I'm willing to give you a smaller share this round, but I think I deserve a bit more than 45%.
I'm trying to maximize my share, but I'm willing to compromise. Will you accept this offer?
I'm starting to think you're not serious about finding a fair split. I'm taking a firmer stance this round, but I'm still willing to negotiate.
I'm trying to get as much as I can, but I'm still willing to compromise. Will you meet me halfway?
I'm not budging on the amount, but I'm willing to meet you halfway on the split. Take it or leave it.
I'm running out of time, and I need to get as much as I can. This is my final offer, take it or leave it.
You're running out of time too, Alice. I'm not going to give in now. This is my last offer, take it or leave it.
